Member Login
Request More Information
Download the Watersound Club Membership App
Experience the new Watersound Club membership app! This mobile app has been redesigned from the ground up to provide you with the exceptional mobile experience that you deserve. Fully integrated, this app was designed to streamline your Club activity, offering more user-friendly and convenient features. On the new app, you’ll find quick links to all your favorite Club activities including:
Event Registration
Tee Times
Fitness Classes
Court Bookings & Clinics
Digital Membership Card with Photo Display and Enhanced Security — now
required*
to make charges to your Membership account as our team will no longer be able to look up accounts by Member number
Staff & Location Directories
Dining Reservations, Menus & Online Ordering**
Private Lessons
My Bookings Calendar
Monthly Statements
And more!
*A physical Member Card may also be presented when making charges to your membership account. While the new app replaces the need for a physical card, the Membership office will continue to print physical cards by request only. Lanyards are available for children who do not have access to the app.
**Coming soon — Online ordering for to-go orders at your favorite Club dining venues.
Update Your Existing App Experience
What do you need to do to get the new app? Just an update! Apple & Android will push out an update, which should automatically update on your mobile device. However, you may be prompted to initiate the update. Once the update comes through, you will need to login to the new app experience using your current app login credentials.
Once logged in, you’ll remain logged in for 30 days at a time. If you wish to log out after each use, there is a logout option. After 30 days of idle use, you will be required to log in. Facial recognition is available as well if you prefer this option.
We are excited to bring you this new piece of technology! If you have questions or need assistance creating/updating your login information, please
contact the Membership Team
.
App Store® is a registered trademark of Apple Inc.
Google Play is a trademark of Google LLC.

RECURRING EVENTS
The following events happen on the same day each year or occur on a regular schedule throughout the year. Discover more about these events in your Member App.
Polar Plunge
January 1
The Beach Club
Game Night
Trivia, Bingo, Poker, and Family Feud
Various Club Locations
Beach Bonfires
Holidays and Special Events
The Beach Club
First Friday: Tennis
First Friday of Each Month
Camp Creek                Tennis Courts
Book Club
Second Wednesday of Each Month
Camp Creek
Wine Market Wednesday
Occurs Weekly
Camp Creek ANR

Member Login
Request More Information
Membership
Explore the club lifestyle
Set in picturesque Northwest Florida, the Watersound Club lifestyle encompasses limitless opportunities for adventure, exploration, wellness, and of course, relaxation. From our pristine pools and private Beach Club to our award-winning golf courses and tennis courts, discover laid-back coastal charm, gracious Southern hospitality and the feeling of pure joy and happiness in every detail.
Our Membership team is ready to answer your questions, provide a tour, and help you and your family make memories as Club members. For more information about Florida’s premiere lifestyle Club and the unique membership options, explore our
Frequently Asked Questions
.
INquire
Northwest Florida’s most prestigious properties
With a collection of Northwest Florida’s most prestigious properties, Watersound Club offers exclusive amenities in beautiful natural  surroundings that Members have come to love  and new Members can call their own.
The quality time and memories created while enjoying life here every weekend, summer, or holiday become stories told for generations. These stories embody a lifestyle that becomes a legacy, and that is a priceless commodity.
Join The Club
